title: New: Stay+ – Fever
body:
I was lucky enough to be at [**Stay +**’s](http://www.facebook.com/staystaystay) very first show in the UK. The gig was a magnitude of emotions for the senses, yet above all else, the sense of imposing dread was paramount. The group really find a way of getting under your skin, whether it’s through the omnipresent visual loops or statue like performance artists, a **Stay +** show really is a trip.

Their new track has an uncompromising ability to recreate the essence of their live shows; it’s a blistering, shrieking and aggravated neon ride, and a much welcome tantalizing taste of what’s to come.

[RAMP048 / Stay+ – Fever](http://soundcloud.com/ramprecordings/ramp048-stay-fever) by [RAMP Recordings / PTN](http://soundcloud.com/ramprecordings)

Photo courtesy of [Naouaelle Photography](www.naouaelle.com).
